intro: Podolepis gracilis, commonly known as the slender podolepis, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Podolepis gracilis is valued for its ecological role in supporting local insect populations and its resilience in arid climates.
